Problems sending email Disagree Agree Terms and Conditions of Use The InspirerMundi is a game with a strong social component which is oriented to patients diagnosed with asthma. The game has the aim of converting the medication intake in a positive experience. It\'s a multilevel game and it is constituted by inspirers (the gamers in advanced levels) and the warriors (the gamers who have an inspirer). By register your medication you are already winning points.\n\nThe best way to win points is to take the medication on a daily basis, and you win a bonus if you take it right on time. When you answer weekly and daily surveys you are winning points. The evaluation that you do to inspirerers and warriors also allow you to increase your score. About PRIVACY POLICY MEDIDA
(VERSION 30/01/2018)
MEDIDA takes your privacy very seriously. That is why we have this Privacy Policy, which discloses the information gathering and dissemination practices through the InspirerMundi app. By using InspirerMundi app software and accepting the Terms of Use you also agree to this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy explains why we collect certain personal information and how we protect your personal information that you provide to us. We also inform you about your rights and the conditions under which we provide information to you and to others. By using this app, you consent to the placing of temporary cookies. MEDIDA (a Portuguese company specialized in the development, evaluation and distribution of products and services for people with chronic diseases, especially for respiratory and allergic patients) is responsible for the processing of your personal data.

If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please send an email to geral@medidasaude.pt . Please state the word \'Privacy\' in the header.

What is "personal information"?
"Personal information" means information that identifies you or could reasonably be used to identify you or another person and which is submitted to and/or collected by the app and maintained by MEDIDA in an accessible form. Examples of personal information include your name and your e-mail address.

What information do we collect and how is the information used?
While using the app you may be asked to provide certain details, including sex, year of birth, country of residence, spoken languages, interests, and also images of your inhaler after each drug intake. You are never obliged to enter your contact details. However, to make use of some of our services and products, it is necessary to provide a limited amount of personal information. The personal information you provide to us by using the app will be used for the execution of the agreement(s) with you, maintaining contacts with you, conduct market research, creation of- and automatic statistical analysis of profiles of app users in order to have a quantitative idea of who need a better treatment, to react to certain environmental conditions, to determine which are the most common symptoms and reactions and to inform you about new developments within our company and our (new) products and services that fall within your area of interest. The information we collect about you may include information relating to your health, namely regarding symptoms and treatments. Health related information that may be designated as "sensitive" under data privacy laws in some jurisdictions, may only be collected where you explicitly consent to this. MEDIDA shall adopt additional measures as required by local law for the processing of such information. We use this information to help us to improve the design of the application and other products, to communicate with you, to improve our marketing and research activities, and to facilitate other business. The data collected will be stored for a maximum period of 15 years or for longer periods as allowed by local law to the initial date of collection.

InspirerMundi app can also determine, upon your consent, your current location information (so-called Geolocation).

Transfer of personal information to different jurisdictions
MEDIDA stores the data on secured servers and suitable for the protection of personal data.

Your rights
In accordance with local law, you may at any time request access to the information we collect about you. You may also request that we amend, correct or delete your personal information. To do this please contact us (MEDIDA) using the contact details below. If you request us to delete your personal information, the result may be that we can no longer provide our services to you.

Privacy of children
The InspirerMundi app was designed to be used by teenagers from 13 years of age. MEDIDA does not knowingly collect or use any personal information from children (being minors younger than 18). We do not knowingly allow children to communicate with us or use any of our services.

If you are a parent and become aware that your child has provided us with information, please contact us using one of the methods specified below, and we will work with you to address this issue.

Property rights
Unless otherwise stated, all rights, including copyrights and other intellectual property rights in the app, the underlying databases and the information you provide to us, rest with MEDIDA.

MEDIDA authorizes you to consult the app and the information contained therein and make copies of such data for your personal use, for example by printing (print screen) or storing such information. Any other use of the app or the information, for example the storage or reproduction of (a part of) the app in any external website or the creation of links, hyperlinks or deeplinks between the app and any other website, is prohibited without the explicit written permission of MEDIDA.

Unsolicited ideas
If you send to unsolicited ideas and/or materials, including but not limited to, text, images, sounds, software or information (the "Materials") to MEDIDA via e-mail or otherwise, MEDIDA is entitled to use, copy and/or commercially exploit such materials to the fullest extent without having to pay. MEDIDA will not be bound to secrecy regarding these Materials.

You hereby indemnify MEDIDA against all damages and costs that MEDIDA incurs with respect to any claims made by third parties regarding the use and / or exploitation of the Materials that infringes (intellectual) property rights of third parties or is otherwise unlawful towards a third party.

Business continuity
You agree that database rights subsisting in the personal information collected from you by MEDIDA is the property of MEDIDA and the database is currently under the responsibility of MEDIDA.

In the event that MEDIDA becomes the object of an acquisition, merger, sale or other transaction and the database, or the company that owns the database, is acquired by a third party, you agree in advance with the disclosure of your personal information to its advisers and the acquiring third party, both during and after the transaction, with a view to facilitating and closing of the transaction. When the transaction is closed, you will be informed about the transaction and the ownership and control over the database and your personal information that you provided to MEDIDA. The personal information will be transferred to the third party, in accordance with the provisions and limitations of this privacy policy. If the transaction is not closed, MEDIDA will have the third party to agree that it ceases using your personal information.

Cookies
This app does not use cookies to obtain information about your use of the app. Only a temporary cookie or so-called \'session\' cookie will be placed for connectivity. When you installed the app you gave your consent for the placing of these temporary cookies.

Session cookies are temporary bits of information that are erased once you turn your device off.

The use of cookies is safe. Personal information such as a phone number or an email address, cannot be traced by placing session cookies. As a result, cookies cannot be used for e-mail and telemarketing purposes. You can find more information about cookies at
www.allaboutcookies.org.

Links in the app
This app may directly or indirectly provide links to other information, such as information on websites maintained by third parties over whom MEDIDA has no control. MEDIDA is not liable for the use or content of this information.

Updates
MEDIDA reserves the right to make changes and/or updates with respect to the information, products and services referred to in this app at any time without notice.

Security
Protecting your privacy is important to you and to us. That is why our systems and programs are adequately protected. We use management procedures to keep the information accurate, up-to-date and complete and to prevent access to your personal information by unauthorized persons from inside and outside our organization. This includes also - but is not limited to - encryption of connections and content.

Although MEDIDA secures all personal information, we urge you to exercise caution when transmitting personal information over the Internet, especially personal information related to your health.

In addition, the app covered by this Privacy Policy may contain links to websites that are not controlled by MEDIDA or subject to MEDIDA\'s Privacy policy; you should check the policies of such third-party websites before submitting personal data.

Service updates and other information
If you are a customer, we may send you information - or contact you otherwise - regarding new services, features and other announcements, in the form of a newsletter or otherwise. It is possible to unsubscribe from these communications. However, in that case you may not be aware of important information about MEDIDA software and the services you use.

Nullification of terms
In the event that the terms of this Privacy Policy are declared partially invalid, parties remain bound to the remaining part. The parties shall replace the invalid parts by provisions that, given the content and purpose of these terms, are valid and have a legal effect similar or as close as possible to that of the invalid part.

Governing law and competent court
Without prejudice to the local law that is imperatively applicable, these terms are exclusively subject to the Portuguese law in force. All disputes arising from these terms must be submitted to a court having jurisdiction in Portugal.

Changes to Privacy Policy
MEDIDA reserves the right to make changes and / or updates to this Privacy Policy to reflect technological advancements, legal and regulatory changes and good business practices.

If MEDIDA changes its privacy or changes its technical practices (such as cookie practices), an updated version will reflect those changes and we will notify you of such changes by updating the effective date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

How can I contact MEDIDA?
If you have questions about the use, amendment, access to or deletion of personal information that you have provided to us, or if you would like to opt out of future communications from MEDIDA, please contact us by e-mailing us at (geral@medidasaude.pt ). Alternatively, you may send a letter to the following address:

(Rua Dr. Manuel Laranjeira nº 55 3ºD, 4200-386 Porto, Portugal)

In all communications to MEDIDA please include your e-mail address and a detailed explanation of your request. If you would like to delete, amend or correct your personal information and are contacting us by e-mail, please put "Deletion Request" or "Amendment/Correction Request", as applicable, in the subject line of the e-mail. We will do our best to respond to all reasonable requests in a timely manner.

Consent to the collection, processing and use of personal data
I agree that the above data (sex, year of birth and country of residence, spoken languages, interests, inhaler images collected), including sensitive data (health data: reported symptoms and treatment), as well as data generated in the use of these data can be processed and used to the extent described above (execution of the contract, statistical analysis, information on new products or services and conducting market research), can be sold - once anonymized - to pharmaceutical companies for commercial purposes, can be sold to academic institutions for the purpose of research. I also agree with the transfer of data to different jurisdictions, including outside the EU, in line with EU data protection standards



TERMS OF USE INSPIRERMUNDI APP
By installing and using InspirerMundi application (app) you agree to the applicability of these Terms of Use (and to the privacy policy below). If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, you must not download or use this app, copyright of which is protected.

\u0009 \u0009 1. InspirerMundi application allows you to register your adherence to asthma medication. The application informs you of the medication time, through a configurable alarm, and allows you to view your adherence statistics and also share this information with your doctor. It also enables the recording of your symptoms related to asthma. The application has a gamification component, through a system of points and badges, where the main objective is to fulfil the therapeutic plan, and a social component, to share experiences with other users.

\u0009 \u0009 2. This application is intended to make process of adherence to treatment into a positive experience and must not be used as a substitute for any kind of professional and/or medical advice.

\u0009 \u0009 3. MEDIDA will be held harmless for any inappropriate use of this application.

\u0009 \u0009 4. This app is provided to you for your personal use and you must not use it to process the personal information of any other person.

\u0009 \u0009 5. This app, and the information contained in it, is provided to you "as is", for informational purposes only, with no guarantee of completeness, accuracy, timeliness or of the results obtained from the use of this information, and without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of performance, merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.

\u0009 \u0009 6. You recognise that the app functionality may be affected by changes in the operating system of your device. It is your responsibility to check for updates in order to determine if you have the most current version of the app, to ensure that it is working properly.

\u0009 \u0009 7. MEDIDA is not liable for any damages, including, and without limitation, direct, indirect, consequential or incidental damages resulting from or in connection with any information, materials, qualifications or recommendations related to this app.

\u0009 \u0009 8. MEDIDA is not liable for any damages resulting from the use of (or inability to use) this app, including damages caused by viruses or any incorrectness or incompleteness of the Information. MEDIDA is also not liable for damages resulting from the use of electronic devices for communication with this app, including - but not limited to - damages resulting from failure or delay in delivery of electronic messages, interception or manipulation of electronic messages by third parties or by software / hardware used for electronic communications and transmission of viruses.

\u0009 \u0009 9. If this app directly or indirectly provides links to other information, such as information on websites maintained by third parties over whom MEDIDA has no control, MEDIDA is not liable for the use or content of this information.

\u0009 \u0009 10. MEDIDA reserves the right to change the InspirerMundi App Terms of Use at any time and without notice.

\u0009 \u0009 11. These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Portuguese law. The competent court in Portugal shall settle all disputes arising in connection with these terms.
\u0009 \u0009 12. InspirerMundi app is a software exclusively owned by MEDIDA - SERVIÇOS EM MEDICINA, EDUCAÇÃO, INVESTIGAÇÃO, DESENVOLVIMENTO E AVALIAÇÃO, LDA.

Contact information
MEDIDA may be contacted via:
Address: Rua Dr. Manuel Laranjeira nº 55 3ºD, 4200-386 Porto
Country: Portugal
Phone: +351 914 767 661
E-mail: geral@medidasaude.pt 
Tax Identification Number: 508 186 005

Note: This app is in beta version and may contain errors. Please send email to the following email: inspirermundi@gmail.com About InspirerMundi 2.0.02 The application InspirerMundi is the result from a partnership among MEDIDA, CINTESIS and BLOOMIDEA.

MEDIDA is a Portuguese company specialized in health and Research and Development (R&D) services for allergic diseases and respiratory pathophysiology. Its acronym reflects its main areas of practice: Medicine, Education, Research, Development and Evaluation. Its main objectives are to increase the quality of life of people with chronic diseases, providing health services and technological solutions that are customized and continuously improved through Research, Development and Innovation.

CINTESIS - Center for Research in Health Technologies and Services is a R&D Unit, whose mission is to find answers and solutions, in the short term, for specific health problems, without losing sight of the cost/efficiency relation.
Hosted by the Faculty of Medicine of University of Porto, CINTESIS is proud of its multicentric, decentralized and flexible nature involving 8 higher education institutions. It also cooperates with 18 polytechnic institutes.

Bloomidea has been making businesses bloom online since 2006. Ideas that turned into projects and that are now references in their industry.
An experienced and dedicated team consisting of web and mobile developers, digital marketing specialists, copywriters, designers and managers, is currently leading projects totalling more than 30 million page views per month.

To know more, click on the addresses below:
http://www.medidasaude.net/
http://cintesis.eu/
https://bloomidea.com/

The promotion and distribution of InspirerMundi app in Portugal is the responsibility of Mundipharma Portugal.
If you want to clarify any doubts, contact us via email:
